alert.note: Alert for Divide; Williams (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Chill Warning issued December 27 at 2:23AM CST until December 28 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Bismarck
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CST TODAY... ...WIND CHILL WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM THIS MORNING TO NOON CST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Additional snow accumulation overnight of around an inch. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph causing reduced visibility in blowing snow. Drifting snow. * WHERE...Divide and Williams counties. * WHEN...The Winter Weather Advisory until Noon CST today. The Wind Chill Warning, from 6 AM this morning to Noon CST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Snow covered roads. Blowing and drifting snow with reduced visibility. The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes.
info.instruction: If you are outside be sure you wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. Slow down and use caution while traveling.
